comments.body:
`Do` should just take a `Disruption` & a list of `Test`s.

@ArtfulCoder
@ArtfulCoder I will get to this early this afternoon.

@ArtfulCoder in trying to do this, I remembered why I didn't do this initially.  I'd like to provide the caller this ability to provide `chaosmonkey.Test`s and `chaosmonkey.Interface` structs (in preparation for "make `ServiceTestJig` implement `chaosmonkey.Interface`", above).  I don't see how that could be accomplished without separate registration functions for those two types.  What would the signature of `Do` be?
Add a comment here explaining why we wait for ready or done.
